author: marcus
msg: Fixed typos in the news articles for linking to the AOO mailing lists

author: bfoster
msg: - Created Java Logger Handler for CAS-PGE... This handler will allow for multiple CAS-PGE instances to exist in the same JVM while routing the logging from each to their own log files in their execution directory
- adding support for PgeMetadata to take PgeTaskMetKeys directly
- some cleanup and reorganizing of PgeTaskInstance
